Class ClientSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.DatagramSocket
      • ColorioClient.ClientSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener

    public class ClientSocket
extends java.net.DatagramSocket
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This class is responsible for the communication with th server
